item.title: Karnataka: Raichur woman sends her mangalsutra to home minister
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: The wife of a man who died by suicide sent her mangalsutra to Home Minister Dr G Parameshwara, demanding action against employees of a microfinance company who allegedly drove her husband to take the extreme step.
Parvathi, the widow from Kapagal village in Manvi taluk, Raichur district, alleged that the employees of the microfinance company harassed her husband, Sharanabasava. She demanded immediate action against those responsible. She also met the Raichur superintendent of police an...]]>
item.author: Express News Service

item.title: 14 killed in two separate road accidents in Karwar, Raichur districts
